title: Shortest Path Down Mt. St. Helens
description: Implemented the A* search algorithm and admissible heuristic functions to find the shortest path down Mt. Saint Helens from a certain elevation.

title: Connect 4 AI
description: Designed Alpha-Beta Pruning and Minimax-based algorithms to efficiently and competitively play the game of Connect-4  against other AI-based agents

title: Deep Q-Learning Atari Pong
description: Implemented and trained a deep learning model for playing Atari Pong using Deep Q-Learning by representing game states & actions and creating an objective function

title: Coursera for CodeLab Org
description: Developed a MERN web application in a cross-functional team that houses training material for members of a student org to learn basic web development skills through courses and bootcamps

title: Shell Implementation
description: Built a shell that accepts input from the user in the form of command lines and executes them as jobs. It can understand built in commands as well as piping and output redirection
